titles.title: A bill to provide for the transfer of certain lands in the State of Arizona, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: Public Lands, National Parks and Forests
committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 3/3/1987--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey without consideration to a school district in Payson, Arizona, specified lands known as the Payson School Site in Gila County, Arizona, for use as a public school.
